title: [Large-Scale] Flipped Learning-Based CPR Practical Skills Enhancement Course: Integrating Scientific Inquiry and Hands-On Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic CPR procedures and AED usage, foundational knowledge of physiological variables and emergency situation assessment
context.additional_context: A blended learning course combining VR simulations and team-based learning for current professionals. The focus is on systematically analyzing and improving the accuracy and efficiency of CPR techniques through scientific inquiry methods.

learning_goals: Learners perform adult/pediatric CPR procedures in VR simulations with ≥90% accuracy, following scientific principles
Through Team-Based Learning (TBL), learners experiment/observe effective emergency role-allocation protocols within 10 minutes and propose evidence-based approaches
Using RQI (Resuscitation Quality Improvement) equipment, learners measure/analyze and master techniques meeting ≥85% compression depth/speed standards
Learners demonstrate theoretical knowledge of CPR (physiological variables, emergency protocols) by scoring ≥80 on MCQ assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
